long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring your browsing experience to life with Custom Dog Cursors! Choose from a delightful collection of dog-themed cursors to replace your default pointer. Whether you're a dog lover or just looking to add some playful charm to your screen, this extension has you covered.

Key Features:

🐾 Adorable Dog Designs: Pick from a variety of dog-inspired cursors to personalize your pointer.
🖱️ Hover Effects: Automatically switch to a pointer-style cursor when hovering over buttons, links, or other interactive elements.
🔄 Reset Anytime: Easily return to the default cursor whenever you want.
🌐 Seamless Integration: Works on all webpages, dynamically updating to match interactive elements.
🚀 Lightweight & Easy to Use: Quick setup and intuitive controls for a hassle-free experience.
Add some canine charm to your browsing routine with Custom Dog Cursors—a must-have for every dog enthusiast! 🐶
